metadata.title: CVE-2020-12767 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
exif_entry_get_value in exif-entry.c in libexif 0.6.21 has a divide-by-zeroerror.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-12767` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libexif12 - 0.6.21-4ubuntu0.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libexif package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.6.21-4ubuntu0.2').
